thread.title: Rhonda Cummings
thread.title_full: Quicken Loans reviewed by Rhonda Cummings

author: Rhonda Cummings
title: Rhonda Cummings
text: It was a pleasure working with the team I had helping me with my re-finance. They made it very smooth and answered any questions that I had. They were also very friendly, which made the transaction very pleasurable. I would recommend everyone I know, to definitely use them for there finance needs.
